author: chunqingchen
body: Remove the unnecessary use of lock in PseudoParameterBinder to avoid deadlock

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body: Hi **@chunqingchen**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! This seems like a small (but important) contribution, so no Contribution License Agreement is required at this point. Real humans will now evaluate your PR. TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
@chunqingchen Please make the commit message more meaningful -- describing what the change does.
I changed the title of the PR to make the PR meaningful, you can use the same as the commit message.

title: Remove the unnecessary use of lock in PseudoParameterBinder to avoid deadlock
